General.Name: Deepak Nitrite Limited
General.Description: Deepak Nitrite Limited manufactures and sells chemical intermediates in India and internationally. It operates through Advanced Intermediates and Phenolics segments. The company offers sodium nitrite, sodium nitrate, nitro toluidines, fuel additives, nitrosyl sulphuric acid, xylidines, oximes, cumidines, speciality agrochemicals, optical brightening agent, and diamino stilbene disulfonic acid for colourants, rubber chemicals, explosives, dyes, pigments, food colours, pharmaceuticals, diesel blending, agrochemicals, glass, personal care, paper, detergents, and textiles industries. In addition, it provides cumene, phenol, acetone, isopropyl alcohol, and AMS for various applications including laminates, ply, adhesive, paints, auto, pharmaceuticals, plastics, etc. Deepak Nitrite Limited was incorporated in 1970 and is headquartered in Vadodara, India.
